backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing Valentine share-button features and associated files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base setup with light/dark OKLCH color tokens and theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and setting the Valentine page title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the proposal screen in RomanticLayout and toggles success state on yes click.
frontend/src/components/animations/Confe: Generates 20 animated heart particles for a confetti burst effect.
frontend/src/components/animations/Final: Generates 40 falling heart and sparkle particles for final celebration.
frontend/src/components/animations/Spark: Displays sparkle particles for special effect bursts.
frontend/src/components/AudioToggle.tsx: Button that toggles global audio using shared audio context.
frontend/src/components/RomanticLayout.t: App layout providing floating hearts background, audio provider, and footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/screens/FinalCel: Final screen with celebration animations, restart button, and share option.
frontend/src/components/screens/QuizScre: Renders the quiz flow with question navigation, answer selection, scoring, sound effects, and celebration animations.
frontend/src/components/screens/ResultPe: Displays the perfect score screen with trophy visuals, a redeemable date coupon, and restart/share options.
frontend/src/components/screens/ResultTe: Shows a teasing result screen with dynamic yes/no button behavior and prompts based on the user's score and interactions.
frontend/src/components/screens/Valentin: Handles the Valentine proposal interaction, including a moving 'No' button and a success screen with animations and sharing.
frontend/src/components/screens/WelcomeS: Presents the intro screen with themed visuals, a start button, and a share option for entering the quiz.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: Share button that copies current URL and shows a Valentine-themed toast.
frontend/src/context/AudioControllerCont: Provides global audio control, initializing and managing background music and multiple sound effects.
frontend/src/data/loveQuizQuestions.ts: Defines the quiz question list with options and correct answers used throughout the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioController.ts: Initializes background music and sound effects and exposes controls to toggle audio and play specific SFX.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity auth, managing login, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom romantic-themed colors, utilities, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, shadows, and plugins for the romantic theme.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for the Valentine quiz app.
